title: Recipe Recommender
description: A website made with Django that uses a Content-Based Filtering recommendation system to recommend users recipes they may like based off of recipes they have liked.

title: Sales Forecasting Model
description: Developed a LGBM model for a Kaggle competition using synthetic data to forecast book sales across various countries and stores. My model achieved a SMAPE of 5.85, placing in the top 25% of 1381 participants.

title: Personal Website
description: My own personal website which I made using Django for the backend and React for the frontend. The website also includes an AI Assistant which I made by using Retrieval-Augmented Generation on various documents about me which are fed to an OpenAI API.

title: Manufacuring Control Prediction Kaggle Competition
description: Developed a Keras sequential neural network for a Kaggle competition to predict machine states. My model got an AUC of 0.997 and placing in the top 25%.
